info.name: MyAnimeList - Halloween
info.additionalInfo:
DON'T USE THIS ANYMORE. I'M TOO LAZY TO UPDATE SO THAT IT'LL WORK WITH THE NEW SITE LAYOUT. BYE BYE. THANKS FOR USING



NOTE that there's still A LOT of fixes & cleanup that needs to be done.
It will be done... someday :P
